description: This file describes the concept, management, and usage of subsystems within the Thunder framework, including how plugins can interact with subsystems, mark them active/inactive, get their status, subscribe to notifications, and specify dependency metadata for plugin startup/shutdown sequencing.

classes.name: InternetInfo
classes.description: Implementation of the IInternet interface representing the state of the Internet subsystem, including IP address and network type.

methods.name: InternetInfo::PublicIPAddress
methods.description: Returns the current public IP address of the Internet subsystem.

methods.name: InternetInfo::NetworkType
methods.description: Returns the network type (unknown, IPv4, IPv6) of the Internet subsystem.
